job_details.Vacaturetitel: Sr. Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development

* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of GenAI services, integration of AI services into product offerings, and staying informed on the latest AI technologies. The core responsibilities align with building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems using generative models, which is the definition of a GenAI Engineer. While software development and MLOps are mentioned, the primary focus is on the application and development of GenAI services.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences' directly relates to building software applications that incorporate AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences

job_tasks.justification: Implementing coding best practices for modularity, reusability, and maintainability is a core aspect of software engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem implies understanding how AI fits into the broader business product.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem

job_tasks.justification: Assessing and optimizing existing AI services points to working with and improving AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Assess and optimize existing AI services

job_tasks.justification: Enhancing performance and conforming to industry trends for AI services can involve aspects of operational optimization and deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends

job_tasks.justification: Supporting and mentoring other engineers involves communication and collaboration within a team.
Staying informed on the latest AI technologies and exploring their applicability demonstrates a commitment to continuous learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services
